channel.title: Making Items Staff Only
channel.description:
Hey Mopies,
I was wondering how to make certain items staff only, so if a normal player ( Rights = 0 ) tries to wield them they can't :D Any help is appreciated!
Leo

item.title: Making Items Staff Only
item.dc:creator: @nickenator nickenator
item.description:
@nickenator wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:350392”]If you ever call us ‘mopies’ again, I will find where you live and tear out your throat.

David[/quote]

I lmfao’d at this, but yea just go into the weapon handler and add it

Read full topic

item.title: Making Items Staff Only
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

Okay, I’ve done it now.
If anyone else needs help with this I recommend you go to:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,434404.msg3189785.html#msg3189785

Thanks vOx

Read full topic

item.title: Making Items Staff Only
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Da Vinci, post:4, topic:350392”][quote author=God11 link=topic=446756.msg3278842#msg3278842 date=1279744489]
just go to

    /* Equipment level checking*/[/code]

and add the item under u want only staff

examp
[code]        if (ItemID == 773 && playerRights <= 1) {
                    PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                            + " IS TRYING TO WEAR P RING BAN HIM!!");
	    return 1000;

	}[/code]

rights 1 means that admin and above can only weild it
change it to 2 for owners only or to 0 for all staff to weild.

this code means that they have to either be admin or above to weild or have 1000 att.

get it?

oh and this code
[code]                    PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                            + " IS TRYING TO WEAR P RING BAN HIM!!");

will announce to everyone that he has the p ring
[/quote]

With that I get this error when trying to compile:

[code]client.java:4362: incompatible types
found : int
required : java.lang.string
return 1000;

1 error
Press a key to carry on.[/code][/quote]

Your method’s return type is String, not int.

Read full topic
